hero.title: Revolutionising
hero.subtitle: TACTEC unifies sports science, medical, tactical, and operations into one clean platform. Plan sessions, monitor wellness, prevent injuries, and align staff—end to end.

challenge.title: Fragmented football operations slow teams down
challenge.subtitle: Data and workflows are scattered across spreadsheets, chats, and disconnected tools. Staff spend time syncing instead of improving performance.

staff.title: Siloed Staff
staff.desc: Coaches, analysts, medical, and operations lack a single source of truth.

workflows.title: Messy Workflows
workflows.desc: Session plans, loads, availabilities, and logistics live in different places.

insights.title: Lost Insights
insights.desc: Wellness + performance data isn’t connected, so prevention is reactive, not proactive.

solution.title: One platform. Total clarity.
solution.subtitle: TACTEC centralises planning, communication, medical, analytics, and reporting—designed with a universal clean architecture to scale from academy to first team.

features.title: Comprehensive team management
features.subtitle: Pick what you need now; scale later—everything stays in sync.

tech.title: Universal Clean Architecture
tech.subtitle: Four layers ensure separation of concerns, testability, and long-term agility.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent plans
pricing.subtitle: Start small, expand as your club grows.

cta.title: Your club—unified, in your hand
cta.subtitle: See TACTEC in action and get your first squads onboarded in days, not months.

footer.about: A clean, modular operating system for modern football clubs.

faq.a1: TACTEC est une plateforme professionnelle de gestion de clubs de football qui intègre les flux médicaux, tactiques, scientifiques et opérationnels au sein d’un système unifié.
faq.a2: TACTEC s’adresse aux clubs professionnels, aux académies et aux organisations sportives recherchant efficacité, scalabilité et décisions fondées sur les données.
faq.q3: Quels sont les avantages de TACTEC ?
faq.a3: TACTEC réduit le risque de blessure, renforce la coordination et consolide l’ensemble des opérations du club dans une plateforme sécurisée et évolutive.
